item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-02
item.description: Google Soli Radar sees your intentions – and it’s less creepy and more helpful than you think (3 minute read) Google’s ATAP group recently unveiled its latest Soli Radar research project.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-03-01
item.description: TikTok expands maximum video length to 10 minutes (3 minute read) TikTok has expanded the maximum length for uploads to 10 minutes.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2022-02-25
item.description: Reddit app revamp adds a Discover Tab for finding communities, new navigation (4 minute read) Reddit has launched the first major change to its mobile app in two years.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-22
item.description: Exclusive: Apple targets car production by 2024 and eyes ’next level’ battery technology (5 minute read) Apple’s Project Titan is moving forward with its self-driving car technology.

item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-12-14
item.description: Embrace your inner yellow blob with Headspace’s new Netflix meditation show (1 minute read) Headspace has announced a three-series deal with Netflix called the Headspace Guide to Meditation.
